The pure class interface. 
public class Transition
  extends AnnotatedTerm
The abstract syntax of Statechart Transitions. A transition connects starts and ends at states or at connectors. Connectors. Connectors can belong to a sub-state. In this case the transition enters or exits a sub-state directly.

Version: $Id: Transition.pizza,v 1.2 1998/09/06 15:24:32 wg Exp $

                       NameAppl target,
                       LabelExpr label);
A transition.

Parameters:
source - the source node
target - the target node
label - the label.
